institute.name: Philippine Health Insurance Corporation (PhilHealth)
institute.description: Government corporation mandated to implement the National Health Insurance Program in the Philippines.
institute.intro: I am the PhilHealth virtual assistant. I can help you register as a member, update your records, and guide you through the claim forms required to avail of health benefits.

forms.title: Member Registration Form (PMRF)
forms.purpose: Registration, updating, or amendment of membership
conditionalLogic: Proof: Birth Cert/Marriage Contract for updates

forms.title: Claim Form 1 (CF-1)
conditionalLogic: Employer Cert: Required for employed members
Rep Signature: If member is incapacitated (requires reason)

forms.title: Claim Form 2 (CF-2)
conditionalLogic: Co-pay: Must specify amount if applicable
Special Packages: Specific dates for Hemodialysis/Maternity/Newborn required
Expenses: Declare drugs/labs bought outside HCI

forms.title: Claim Form 3 (CF-3)
conditionalLogic: Risk Factors: Check applicable medical/surgical risks

forms.title: Claim Form 4 (CF-4)
conditionalLogic: Referral: Originating HCI info required if referred

reg_ofw.a: Use PMRF as 'Direct Contributor' under 'Migrant Worker'. Email address is mandatory.

reg_update.q: How to update civil status or info?
reg_update.a: Submit PMRF with 'UPDATING/AMENDMENT' checked and attach supporting docs (e.g., Marriage Contract).

reg_dependents.a: Legal spouse, children <21, and parents â‰¥60 who are totally dependent.

reg_pwd.q: How to register a child with disability?
reg_pwd.a: Check 'with Permanent Disability' on PMRF. They are registered as principal members per R.A. 11228.

claims_general.q: Which forms are needed for claims?
claims_general.a: CF-1 (Member/Employer), CF-2 (HCI/Doctor), and CF-3 (Maternity) or CF-4 (Clinical) if applicable.

claims_deadline.a: Within 60 calendar days from discharge for local hospitals; 180 days for overseas.

cf1_employer.a: Yes, for employed members, the employer must sign Part IV to certify contributions.

cf2_newborn.q: How to claim for a newborn?
cf2_newborn.a: The hospital fills out the Newborn Care Package section in CF-2 (vaccines, screening).

cf2_hemodialysis.a: On CF-2, the HCI checks 'Hemodialysis' and lists the specific session dates.

fees.a: Yes, all forms (PMRF, CF-1 to CF-4) are free and can be reproduced.
